description: The puffer vest, Cotopaxi style. The Solazo provides core warmth, reliable comfort, and a dose of color. Featuring a slightly longer length, a drop-tail hem, and cozy fleeze-lined collar, this vest is sure to become your retro-inspired, cool-weather trademark—perfect for chilly basements, mountain town strolls, and evenings at the ice rink.
name: Cotopaxi Solazo Down Vest - Mens
